verses.verse: A Psalm of Solomon. <S%H5414>Give<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, And thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>.
He will <S%H1777>judge<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, And thy <S%H6041>poor<s%> with <S%H4941>justice<s%>.
The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%>, And the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, He will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%>, And will break in <S%H1792>pieces<s%> the <S%H6231>oppressor<s%>.
They shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee <S%H5973>while<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H6440>endureth<s%>, And so long as the <S%H3394>moon<s%>, throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
He will come <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H4306>rain<s%> upon the <S%H1488>mown<s%> <S%H7241>grass<s%>, As showers that <S%H2222>water<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
In his <S%H3117>days<s%> shall the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6524>flourish<s%>, And <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, till the moon be no <S%H3394>more<s%>.
He shall have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> also from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea<s%>, And from the <S%H5104>River<s%> unto the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
They that dwell in the <S%H6728>wilderness<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H341>him<s%>; And his enemies shall <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> and of the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H4503>tribute<s%>: The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H5434>Seba<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H814>gifts<s%>.
Yea <S%H4428><s%>, all kings shall fall <S%H7812>down<s%> before <S%H1471>him<s%>; All nations shall serve <S%H5647>him<s%>.
For he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> when he <S%H7768>crieth<s%>, And the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, that hath no <S%H5826>helper<s%>.
He will have <S%H2347>pity<s%> on the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H1800>needy<s%>, And the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%> he will <S%H3467>save<s%>.
He will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H8496>oppression<s%> and <S%H2555>violence<s%>; And <S%H3365>precious<s%> will their <S%H1818>blood<s%> be in his <S%H5869>sight<s%>:

And they shall <S%H2421>live<s%>; and to him shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> of the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%>: And men shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> for him <S%H8548>continually<s%>; They shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> him all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>.

There shall be <S%H6451>abundance<s%> of <S%H1250>grain<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> like <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>: And they of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H6692>flourish<s%> like <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

His <S%H8034>name<s%> shall endure for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; His <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H5125>continued<s%> as long <S%H6440>as<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>: And men shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> in <S%H1471>him<s%>; All nations shall call him <S%H833>happy<s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Who only <S%H6213>doeth<s%> wondrous <S%H6381>things<s%>:

And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be his <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; And let the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with his <S%H3519>glory<s%>. <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
The <S%H8605>prayers<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> are <S%H3615>ended<s%>.
